channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Jason Aldean Extends Full Throttle Tour to Australia and New Zealand for 2026
item.description: 🌏 Pack your bags, mates! Jason Aldean is taking his Full Throttle Tour down under in 2026! 🎸 #JasonAldean #FullThrottleTour #Australia #NewZealand

item.title: Original Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Movie Returning to Theaters for 35th Anniversary
item.description: 🐢 Turtle power is back! Grab your pizza and shell-ebrate the 35th anniversary of the OG Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movie in theaters! 🍕🎉 #TurtlePower #TMNT

item.title: How Sabrina Carpenter Raised $1 Million for Charity
item.description: Sabrina Carpenter is not just slaying the music game, she's also a total boss at giving back! 🌟💸 #MusicForACause

item.title: Yo Gabba Gabba! Announce 2025 US Tour Dates
item.description: 🎉 Hold onto your hats, Yo Gabba Gabba! is hitting the road in 2025! 🚌 Which city will you be dancing in? #YoGabbaGabbaTour2025

item.title: Black Sabbath Receive Birmingham’s Highest Honor in Medal Ceremony
item.description: 🤘 Legendary rockers Black Sabbath are now officially Birmingham royalty! 🎸👑 #MetalLegends #RockRoyalty
